projects.name: Random Quote Generator
projects.description: Second project built as part of FCC curriculum. Built using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and an array of quotes.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: Calculator written in JavaScript. Built using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap.

projects.name: Local Weather
projects.description: First single app app to be built using a call to an API. There were two aspects to this project - being able to access a user's gelocation data, and translating this to an API call to a weather API, allowing for the app to display the weather in the current location.

projects.name: Twitch TV
projects.description: Exploration into using APIs and Angular! This was a fun project which included a call to the TwitchTV API, and displaying the output using Angular.

projects.name: Wikipedia Viewer
projects.description: Second project which combined an API call and Angular.

projects.name: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: Toughest project to date. Initially begun with an education in AI - looking at the MiniMax algorith and alpha-beta pruning. Decided upon a hard-coded route, whereby the "AI's" decision was a result of the player's previous moves.

projects.name: Simon Game
projects.description: First project built in an object-oriented manner. Included by first attempts at test-driven development, with testing carried out using QUnit.
